## ScrollEasing type

The easing types available for the horizontal-scroll [HorizontalScroll](./fast-foundation.horizontalscroll.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ScrollEasing = "linear" | "ease-in" | "ease-out" | "ease-in-out" | string;
```
